With this approach it is possible to fill HTML templates with further information, links and buttons to find the solution ASAP.

provisioning.snippet: This document describes patterns to automate the deployment of an application to a target environment. The major players in this documentation are (1) the process as a whole (aka provisioning), (2) automation code and (3) application/ infra code to be deployed.
